meanings.definition: Too broad or general in scope
meanings.sent1: The overbroad statement covered too many topics at once.
meanings.sent2: Her overbroad explanation left out important details.
meanings.sent3: The overbroad rule made everyone confused.
meanings.sent4: His overbroad assumptions led to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The overbroad brush strokes created a messy painting.

meanings.sent1: The overbroad highway stretched for miles without any exits.
meanings.sent2: Their overbroad collection of books filled the entire room.
meanings.sent3: The overbroad buffet had more food than anyone could eat.
meanings.sent4: Her overbroad wardrobe consisted of clothes in every color imaginable.
meanings.sent5: The overbroad sky was filled with countless stars.
